item.title: Counting Sort
item.description: Characteristics Counting sort can be applied if the input numbers are in the set {0, 1, .. ,k}, a set of non negative integers with a maximum value k. There is no comparisons between input elements take place in counting sort. It uses array indexing to determine the relative order of the input numbers. It identifies relative positions of each input elements. For each element x, counting sort counts number of elements less than x.
